parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of the BOM Table Area in the theme (see Remarks )

parameters.name: BomTableName
parameters.description: Name of the BOM table to map to the BOM Table Area specified by Index (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Columns
parameters.description: Array of strings of the names of the columns to export from the BOM table specified in BomTableName (see Remarks )

title: IMBD3DPdfData.SetBomTable
description: Maps a BOM Table Area in the theme with a BOM table in the model and sets the columns in the BOM table to export to the BOM Table Area in a SOLIDWORKS MBD 3D PDF.
signature:
System.Int32 SetBomTable( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.String
BomTableName
,
   System.Object
Columns
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 0-based index of the BOM Table Area in the theme (see Remarks )

parameters.name: BomTableName
parameters.description: Name of the BOM table to map to the BOM Table Area specified by Index (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Columns
parameters.description: Array of strings of the names of the columns to export from the BOM table specified in BomTableName (see Remarks )

returns: 0 = success; BOM table mapped 1 = failure; specified BomTableName not found in model
remarks:
To get...
Call...
Index
IMBD3PdfData::GetBomAreaCount
to find out the number of BOM Table Areas in the theme
BOMTableName
IBomFeature::Name
Columns
ITableAnnotation::ColumnCount
to get the number of columns in the BOM table
ITableAnnotation::GetColumnTitle
for each column you want to export after getting the
table annotation
for the
BOM table annotation
